unnormalised: Yaar, solar rooftop subsidies are a great idea! Imagine, saving money and helping the planet. Heard Sharmaji in Bangalore got a huge discount. Thinking of installing one before Diwali. My wife wants to fry her kachoris with clean energy. Wonder how much the Karnataka govt. is giving these days. Anyone knows? Saving money is like getting a free plate of biryani! Should call up Tata Power I guess.
